subject: Football
Doping (Sports)
Television

Steroids
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball and N.F.L. players are taking a host of designer steroids and other banned performance-enhancing drugs, according to an Al Jazeera investigation.
snippet: Major League Baseball and N.F.L. players are taking a host of designer steroids and other banned performance-enhancing drugs, according to an Al Jazeera investigation.
